subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees opened leads of 8-4 and 12-8 but allowed the Rangers to pull within a run and load the bases in the ninth before David Robertson got Adrian Beltre to fly out to end the game.
snippet: The Yankees opened leads of 8-4 and 12-8 but allowed the Rangers to pull within a run and load the bases in the ninth before David Robertson got Adrian Beltre to fly out to end the game.
